name: Submarine cables - Electromagnetic fields from power cables or communication lines - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: Data on telecommunication submarine cables were used, from Greg's Cable Map (Greg Mahlknecht) and Telegeography, and merged together. Then, a focal statistics spatial analysis was performed using a wedge-shaped neighborhood by summation of 20 pixels cell radius within 0-360 degree looking angles. Finally, a linear normalization within a 0-100 scale was performed. Known limitations: The beffer zone can gives the bias to capture effect within this activity.

citation: Zerne P (2022). Submarine cables - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool. URL: https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
